headline: McCormick & Company to Report 2025 Fourth Quarter Financial Results on January 22, 2026
summary: McCormick & Company, Incorporated (NYSE: MKC), a global leader in flavor, is scheduled to conduct a conference call and webcast of its fourth quarter 2025 financial results on Thursday January 22, 2026, at 8:00 a.m. Eastern Time. Brendan Foley, Chairman, President & CEO; Marcos Gabriel, Executive Vice President & CFO; and Faten Freiha, Vice President of Investor Relations will be hosting the call. A live audio webcast of the call along with the accompanying presentation materials will be availab
